metadata.dc:author: Alvarez Arenal, A
del Campo Oliver, A
Costilla Garcia, S
Gomez Martinez, J L
Rodriguez Gonzalez, M A
Villa Vigil, M A
metadata.dc:description: We present a method for the measure of the real BENNET angle by C.T. We think this radiology technique is very profitable for the research of the T.M.J. functional Anatomy.
metadata.dc:title: Un metodo para el estudio del angulo de Bennet mediante tomografia axial computerizada.
[A method for studying the Bennet angle using computerized axial tomography].
